targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_duration_seconds_count{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (instance, handler, le) (rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_duration_seconds_bucket{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period]))),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_bytes_sent_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_bytes_received_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="push"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_connection_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="rpc"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

panels.description: Estimate of available bandwidth between nodes. Calculated with `CWND`/`RTT`.
panels.title: Bandwidth Estimate

panels.description: Estimate of available bandwidth between nodes. Calculated with `CWND`/`RTT`.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  (
    label_replace(
    (
      rate(quic_transport_quinn_path_lost_packets{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"}[$period])/
      rate(quic_transport_quinn_path_sent_packets{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
    ),
    "ic_node", "$1", "ic_node", "(.*?)-.*-(.*?)")
  ),
  "peer", "$1", "peer", "(.*?)-.*-(.*?)"
)

panels.title: packet loss path

panels.description: Estimate of available bandwidth between nodes. Calculated with `CWND`/`RTT`.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  sum by (peer,instance,ic_subnet) (rate(quic_transport_quinn_path_sent_packets{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"}[$period])),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

panels.title: packet send rate

panels.description: Estimate of available bandwidth between nodes. Calculated with `CWND`/`RTT`.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  sum by (peer,instance,ic_subnet) (rate(quic_transport_quinn_path_lost_packets{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"}[$period])),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"

panels.title: packet loss rate

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_request_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", stream="bidi"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_request_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", stream="uni"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  sum(rate(quic_transport_request_handle_requests_duration_seconds_count{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period])) without (),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(quic_transport_request_handle_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", handler=~"$handler"}[$period])) without ()),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(

  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
